an3.153:1.2: asucina kayakammena, asucina vacikammena, asucina manokammena …pe….
an3.153:2.2: sucina kayakammena, sucina vacikammena, sucina manokammena—
an3.153:2.3: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tihi dhammehi samannagato pandito viyatto sappuriso akkhatam anupahatam attanam pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca vinnunam, bahunca punnam pasavati”ti.
